content: beginning of the next shell insert the hook into both the 37th and the 93rd stitches and finish working the double_crochet as usual continue working the shell pattern across the back 11 shells 66 stitches mark the 159th stitch skip 55 stitches for the second sleeve then make 1 double_crochet for the beginning of the next shell by inserting the hook into the marked 159th and the 215th stitches together and finish working the double_crochet continue working shells across the front yoke stitches - make 6 shells there are now 23 shells 6 shells on right front 11 on back 6 on left front work 19 rounds in shell pattern as follows round 1 work 3 times round 2 work 4 times round 3 work 12 times now make the sleeves left sleeve size 5 years old child work in rounds with light pink color in double_crochet only round 1 3 chain as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 54 sts join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 55 double_crochet total rounds 2 14 work around in double_crochet as for the 1st round at the same time shaping the sleeve by decreasing 1 stitch in round 2 5 8 11 and 14 at the end of round 14 there ll be 50 double_crochet rounds 15 19 begin increases add 1 double_crochet every round at the end of round 19 there ll be 55 double_crochet round 20-26 3 chain as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 54 sts join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 55 double_crochet total round 27 one round of single_crochet round 28 make a scallop edging *1 single_crochet skip 2 stitches work 5 double_crochet in the next stitch skip 2 stitches work 1 single_crochet in next stitch* repeat from * to end of round join to 1st single_crochet with a st st and finish off size 3 years work with grey-brown color round 1-18 work same way as size 5 years old round 19 3 chain as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 54 sts join with a st st in 1st double_crochet 55 double_crochet total round 20 change to edging color and work one round of single_crochet round 21 make a scallop edging *1 single_crochet skip 2 stitches work 5 double_crochet in the next stitch skip 2 stitches work 1 single_crochet in next stitch* repeat from * to end of round join to 1st single_crochet with a st st and finish off left sleeve size 3 year old child © vendula maderska 2013 the patterns are intended for personal use only that means none commercial purposes all rights reserved you are not allowed neither to sell copy share translate to another language and publish the patterns or parts of it sell the creation made from these patterns without particularly permission of the author if you have any questions feel free to ask on this e-mail vendula maderska@seznam cz thank you ♥ february 2013 10 magic with hook and needles w ww vendulkam blogspot com right sleeve 5
